languages.text: Any damage the character deals is increased by +1 for every attack they have made this combat. Does not affect damage-over-time effects: {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.
languages.original_text: Весь наносимый персонажем урон увеличивается на 1 за каждую атаку, которую он совершил в бою. Не применяется к эффектам периодического урона: {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечению{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравлению{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Any damage the character deals is increased by +1 for every attack they have made this combat. Does not affect damage-over-time effects: bleeding, burning, or toxin.

Any damage the character deals is increased by +1 for every attack they have made this combat. Does not affect damage-over-time effects: {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.

languages.text: El daño que inflige el personaje aumenta en +1 por cada ataque que ha lanzado este combate. No afecta al daño de efectos de daño gradual: {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}.
languages.original_text: Any damage the character deals is increased by +1 for every attack they have made this combat. Does not affect damage-over-time effects: {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El daño que inflige el personaje aumenta en +1 por cada ataque que ha lanzado este combate. No afecta al daño de efectos de daño gradual: {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}.

languages.text: このキャラクターが与えるあらゆるダメージは、この戦闘で行った攻撃1回につき+1される。{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}などの継続ダメージ効果には影響しない。
languages.original_text: Any damage the character deals is increased by +1 for every attack they have made this combat. Does not affect damage-over-time effects: {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターが与えるあらゆるダメージは、この戦闘で行った攻撃1回につき+1される。{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}などの継続ダメージ効果には影響しない。

languages.text: 角色在本场战斗中每攻击一次，所有攻击造成的伤害就额外提高1点。此加成不影响持续伤害效果：{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}。
languages.original_text: Any damage the character deals is increased by +1 for every attack they have made this combat. Does not affect damage-over-time effects: {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 角色在本场战斗中每攻击一次，所有攻击造成的伤害就额外提高1点。此加成不影响持续伤害效果：{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}。
角色在本场战斗中每攻击一次，所有攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}就额外提高1点。此加成不影响持续伤害效果：{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}。

languages.text: Der Schaden, den der Charakter verursacht, wird für jeden Angriff, den er in diesem Kampf ausgeführt hat, um +1 erhöht. Wirkt sich nicht auf Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte aus: {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}.
languages.original_text: Any damage the character deals is increased by +1 for every attack they have made this combat. Does not affect damage-over-time effects: {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Schaden, den der Charakter verursacht, wird für jeden Angriff, den er in diesem Kampf ausgeführt hat, um +1 erhöht. Wirkt sich nicht auf Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte aus: {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}.

languages.text: Les dégâts infligés par le personnage augmentent de +1 par attaque qu'il a menée au cours du combat. N'affecte pas les effets de dégâts progressifs : {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g}.

Весь наносимый персонажем урон увеличивается на 1 за каждую атаку, которую он совершил в бою. Не применяется к эффектам периодического урона: {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечению{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравлению{/g}.

languages.text: Karakterin bu çatışmada yaptığı her saldırının verdiği hasar 1 puan artar. Zamanla hasar veren {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksin{/g} etkilerine tesir etmez.
